description:
'4tPadCalculator' is the free version of the scientific '4tPcalculator Pro'. This free version provides a basic calculator that uses the advantages of the touchscreen. Is has lots of additional functions to make calculations easier & faster.
The editline is designed to enter a calculation according to the usual algebraic notation.
Simply tap the [=]-button to get the result. The formula is cached in one of 5 'history' entries.
4tPadCalculator can export formulas and results to the memos app or to the clipboard.
The user interface offers several 'preferences': autoAC, AC-lock, education mode and color theme.
Functions of some special buttons:
[Round:..] sets the digits displayed after the point.
[M'in] / [MR] saves the number displayed in the y memory / puts the value of y into the editline.
[dip] (Display input) Inserts 'dip' for the number from the display line in the editfield. A doubletap of this button shows the value of the display directly.
[>] / [I>I] / [>I<] Moves the cursor through the editline.
[Del] / [AC] Deletes the character in front of the cursor / the whole editline (see also autoAC and AC-lock option).
Do you want to support smart apps for the tP or simply more features? Get the advanced version of this app  '4tPcalculator Pro' - available now in the App Catalog!
For further questions and remarks please send an email to webmaster@knoopnet.de
